price: 33. « Seigneur, dit Moïse, j’ai tué l’un des leurs, et je crains qu’ils ne me tuent.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
